data.name: Niinamigota Soundtrack [OST]
data.detailed_description:
Experience again Niinamigota's Soundtrack!

Musical Style:


    [Chiptune]
    [Nintendo]
    [SNES]


Made With: FL Studio 12, Cubase 7.5, Abelton 10, Notion6
data.about_the_game:
Experience again Niinamigota's Soundtrack!

Musical Style:


    [Chiptune]
    [Nintendo]
    [SNES]


Made With: FL Studio 12, Cubase 7.5, Abelton 10, Notion6
data.short_description: Music is sad. Music is Beautiful. Music is imagination. As is Niinamigota. Niinamigota = Imagination.Listen to the music. Play the Game. Reminisce. Be happy and upbeat. Be dark and lost.This package also includes the Full and Original Niinamigota Script of every dialogue from each character!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Made With FL Studio, Cubase 7.5, Abelton 10, Notion6
